node.display_long_description:
AltspaceVR is the premier place to attend live shows, meetups, cool classes, and more with friendly people from around the world. Experience a spotlight event at 7pm PT every night where you can learn, laugh, and gather with people on every major VR headset. Attend hundreds of spotlight events every month like: Open Mic Night, Improv Comedy, Meditation, LGBTQ+ Meetups, VR Church and more. Easily start your own meetup, show or class and discover the next frontier of entertainment and community.
Don’t just take our word for it, read some of our recent reviews:

“A glimpse into the potential of the future. It is good to be alive.”

“I was planning on just checking it out, ended up staying awake all night.”

“90% of my time spent in VR is in this.”

--
If you have any technical issues, please contact support at http://altvr.com/support/

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
• Microsoft Login support added for Mac builds 
• Several major fixes to Microsoft Account login flow
	• NOTE: If you had previously unlinked your MSA account, please re-link to help us confirm bugfixes. 
• Several Speech fixes, including: 
	• Improvements to intermittent mute after 10 mins
	• Improvements to random audio cutoffs and others. 
• Updates to some 3rd party libraries (including Oculus) to improve stability 
• Retired the Oculus FPS panel in favor of AltspaceVR's more robust Diagnostics Panel. (Main Menu > Settings >Input)
• Added speech captions feature on Mac builds 
	• !! (NOTE: Mac Builds are not officially supported and are not recommended for reliable feature-use by hosts or audiences. Captions have been added as part of our continued pilot initiative.) !!
• Made improvements to startup reliability 
• Added scrolling functionality to Settings panels (Main Menu > Settings)
• Released new Title Screen which makes startup quicker, discoverability easier, and account management simpler 
• Released new Entry Codes for all Events and Worlds enable direct teleportation upon startup

node.name: Meet the Program Owner of AltspaceVR
Meet the Program Owner of AltspaceVR

node.reviewDescription:
Discovered this app a week ago and have met some great people in there in that time. Most of the best things happen in the user created worlds so please don’t bury these so deep in the settings menu guys! It should be way easier to find and activate this than it currently is. 

I’d like to see big improvements to the world editor, it’s a terrible design in game really who designed the menu. If you could just get it to where The Sims was 10 years ago it’d be a big improvement. Auto alignment, easier categories and selections.

Please do all of the above and add simple YouTube, OBS and twitch stream integrations and you’ll start to see a lot more things happening in here guys! I’d like to see you add some dormant character emotes/animations for performers who need to take their headsets off while they perform, I.e if I need to take my headset off to play guitar or piano at an open mic could I first select a guitar or piano playing emote for my dormant avatar while I do that? Would be way less creepy than my guy just falling into a twisted heap during my performance.

3rd party apps made the iPhone what it is. Users make YouTube. Altspace will succeed if you prioritise your world builders and your event & content creators needs first. Love the concept, just really needs some more love and attention.
